about_the_game:
This game is a puzzle game.
This is a free add-on for customers who purchase the Super Hiking Simulator 2020.

How to start

You can select this game when you press "Play" in the STEAM application.

Features of the game

The progress of the puzzle game is automatically saved in real time.
A original design character.
3 puzzles.
There is no time limit so that you can play comfortably.
STEAM Achievements.

Controls

Drag a piece of the puzzle with the mouse to complete a picture.
ESC key or Pause button: PAUSE screen.
Mouse wheel: Zoom in, zoom out.
Drag the left mouse button: move the camera viewpoint.
